description.value:
Tiefling are mortals with a parent or ancestor who is some sort of fiendish creature. Usually, a tiefling looks most like their mortal ancestry, but with horns and reddish skin. Hooves, blue or purple skin, or spikey growths are also fairly common. However, because of the massive diversity of fiends, a tiefling might have features specific to their fiendish ancestor, such as backwards-bending fingers like arakshasa, or a vulture's beak like avrock.

Type: &Reference[Fiend]

Size: Medium or Small

Walking Speed: 30 ft.

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.5l8QNlgPDPOHpGID]{Language}: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.5l8QNlgPDPOHpGID.JournalEntryPage.VZggCkMcvhk0X5Xj#infernal]{Infernal}

Senses: &Reference[Darkvision] 60 ft.

Cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.vRUeWAv7ZesZ1Tzj]{Thaumaturgy}

Damage Resistance: &Reference[Fire]

In the world of Elkan, tieflings are most often descendants of succubi and incubi, mostly due to their general proclivity to be more promiscuous and agreeable than most fiends, but also because the succubus queen Octavia has personally given birth to hundreds of tieflings across the ages. Octavia can be seen picture on our home page. People usually assume tieflings are dangerous, but that's usually because tieflings are forced into a life of crime or marginalization. Those who know better view tieflings as being closer to their mortal heritage than anything else.

advancement.hint: Tiefling are mortals with a parent or ancestor who is some sort of fiendish creature. Usually, a tiefling looks most like their mortal ancestry, but with horns and reddish skin. Hooves, blue or purple skin, or spikey growths are also fairly common. However, because of the massive diversity of fiends, a tiefling might have backwards-bending fingers like a rakshasa, or a vulture's beak like a vrock.
